name: Gerald: Raspberry Pi Robot
short_description:
Gerald is an open source robot run by the raspberry pi microcomputer. All software is proprietary, and all hardware required is off the shelf. Excluding the camera, Gerald can be assembled for less than £50 in total.

Gerald is fully autonomous, and also acts as a web server running a standard LAMP stack. Gerald can be set to run autonomously, can run special, user-written AI behaviours (written in either C++ or PHP), or can respond to commands directly via the "Gerald Command Centre".

Support for Android, Bluetooth and Web Interface control are being worked on.
summary: An open source Raspberry Pi robotics project
